name: TEST PILOT (DANG!)
description:
TEST PILOT is a two-minute survival game about trying not to let your spaceship explode.

In 120 seconds, you'll reach the Humphrey Epsilon Multizonal Spaceport, a safe haven from the unceasing horrors of interstellar travel. But just as your destination is in sight, your ship begins malfunctioning violently -- switches flip on their own, the microwave keeps opening, and some kind of radiation leak is running out of control. Can you prevent your ship from completely exploding before you land?

-------

a game by DANG! and two friends:
Simon Hopkins and Eugene Umlor

------

note! it looks like the game is crashing on some systems -- obviously this is very frustrating now that the jam upload time is over, but we'll have an alternative download link ASAP. sorry for the trouble!
